Instruction: Remove and discard mushroom stems. Clean mushroom caps and place them stem-side down on a baking sheet.
Bake mushrooms for 10 minutes to remove excess moisture.
While mushrooms are baking, finely chop spinach, garlic, and shallot.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut√© garlic and shallot until softened.
Add spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper.
In a bowl, combine cooked spinach, crumbled goat cheese, panko breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, and lemon juice. Stir until well combined.
Stuff mushroom caps with the spinach and goat cheese mixture.
Return stuffed mushrooms to the oven and bake for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender and filling is golden brown.
